hero.title: Interactive online courses
hero.subtitle: is an innovative educational platform offering programming courses led by experienced professionals. Learn through hands-on practice, earn certificates, and develop your skills in the rapidly growing IT industry.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.subtitle: Our mission is to create a platform that enables effective and engaging programming education, supporting the development of technical skills in an accessible way for everyone, regardless of experience level.

methods.name: Interactive exercises
methods.description: Videos, texts, and interactive exercises where participants write code in an AI-verified editor.

methods.name: Tests and quizzes
methods.description: Tools to assess knowledge and reinforce learning with immediate feedback.

methods.name: Accessible for all levels
methods.description: Courses designed for both beginners and advanced programmers, offering a flexible learning experience.

coreValues.title: Core Values
coreValues.subtitle: Our actions are guided by four key values that define our mission and form the foundation of everything we do.

values.name: Accessibility
values.description: We believe that learning programming should be accessible to everyone, regardless of experience or professional background.

values.name: Practicality
values.description: We focus on a practical approach to learning that allows participants to acquire both theoretical knowledge and hands-on skills.

values.name: Innovation
values.description: We embrace modern teaching methods, combining technology with effective educational techniques.

values.name: Support
values.description: We provide support at every stage of learning, helping participants grow and overcome challenges.
